tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  hydropower_project_id UUID NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  environmental_impact TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryComplianceRecords (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  record_date DATE,
  record_description TEXT,
  is_compliant BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE HydropowerOperation (
  operation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_name TEXT,
  operation_type TEXT,
  operation_capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpact (
  impact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_type TEXT,
  impact_level TEXT,
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_date DATE,
    record_description TEXT,
    regulatory_status VARCHAR(50),
    is_completed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE hydropower_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(100),
    operation_location VARCHAR(100),
    operation_capacity DECIMAL(10,2),
    operation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_type VARCHAR(50),
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_date DATE,
    impact_severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
    agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(100),
    agency_location VARCHAR(100),
    agency_contact VARCHAR(50),
    agency_website VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  regulatory_entity VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE hydropower_operations (
  operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_type VARCHAR(50),
  operation_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  capacity DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_description TEXT,
  mitigation_plan TEXT,
  mitigation_cost DECIMAL(12,2)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_entities (
  entity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  entity_name VARCHAR(100),
  entity_type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  compliance_date DATE,
  reviewed_by VARCHAR(100),
  review_result VARCHAR(20)
)
